com.oym.indoor

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oym.indoor.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a notification object. A notification is an event that trigger when a specific action happens about a POI.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Notification.NotificationAction
      Enumeration containing all the Notification Actions

      • fromIntent

        public static Notification fromIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method gets the Notification object from an intent.
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent where the Notification should be extracted
        Returns:
        The extracted Notification object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown while retrieving the object from the Intent
